729741f-a.text:
(1) Todt Hill Road, east side, between New York Avenue and Merrick Avenue, showing the J. Eankey house. The real estate atlases from 1874 to 1907 show it to have belomged to the above family. It was on the property of Edward W. Brown, in 1917.
This is the south side of the house.
Novewber 18, 1910
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
(2) The J. Hankey Nouse, twenty-two years later,when the property was taken over by The Country Pay School of the Staten Island Academy.
Sugust 4,1932
P.L.Sperr
729741f-a.folder: Todt Hill Road & New York Avenue, Staten Island, NY
